block.p: The Sanwa Shutter Corporation of Japan has agreed to buy Overhead Door Inc., which makes garage doors and other automated entrances, for $470 million in cash, Overhead Door said today. Sanwa signed a definitive agreement to acquire Overhead Door's common stock, options and warrants and to redeem its preferred stock. The acquisition is expected to close this month, subject to regulatory approvals. Sanwa Shutter, based in Tokyo, makes shutters, exterior sliding doors and other housing products.

The Sanwa Shutter Corporation of Japan has agreed to buy Overhead Door Inc., which makes garage doors and other automated entrances, for $470 million in cash, Overhead Door said today. Sanwa signed a definitive agreement to acquire Overhead Door's common stock, options and warrants and to redeem its preferred stock. The acquisition is expected to close this month, subject to regulatory approvals. Sanwa Shutter, based in Tokyo, makes shutters, exterior sliding doors and other housing products.
